@for (allData of lightThemeAlertData; track allData) {

Link color in light theme

Use the .alert-link utility class to quickly provide matching colored links within any alert.

@for (alertData of allData.data1; track alertData) {

{{alertData.title}} Light Alert

This is a {{ alertData.title | lowercase }} alert with an example link.Check it out.

}
@for (alertData of allData.data2; track alertData) {

{{alertData.title}} Light Alert

This is a {{alertData.title | lowercase}} alert with an example link. Check it out.

}
}
